title: Iran jurist guardianship is clerics have authority

content.question: In Iran, the concept of jurist guardianship states that

choices.label: the Supreme Court has the power to overturn legislative decisions
the Supreme Court has the power to overturn clerical teachings
the legislature has the power to overturn presidential decisions
senior clerics have authority over the entire community
citizens have the right to remove judges through recall elections

content.answer: senior clerics have authority over the entire community
